name: Interstellar Cafe
description:
(press E to interact)

Introduction

InterstellarCafe is about a girl travelling alone on a spaceship while running a remote cafe. It will take her a few years to reach her destination, but she enjoys making drinks for her friends and family and feels hopeful for what the future may bring. Join her on her peaceful space adventure.  

Credits  Joanna Ho
